skills.name: Strike to Injure
skills.description: +1 to all injury rolls in close combat.

skills.name: Combat Master
skills.description: Can fight against any number of opponents without penalty.

skills.name: Weapons Training
skills.description: Can use any hand-to-hand combat weapon.

skills.name: Web of Steel
skills.description: If armed with two weapons, enemies suffer -1 to hit in close combat.

skills.name: Expert Swordsman
skills.description: Re-roll all missed attacks when using a sword.

skills.name: Step Aside
skills.description: 4+ ward save (dodge) against one hit per combat phase.

skills.name: Quick Shot
skills.description: Can fire twice per turn with ranged weapons (but at -1 to hit).

skills.name: Pistolier
skills.description: Can fire while running. No penalties for moving and shooting with pistols.

skills.name: Eagle Eyes
skills.description: +6" range with ranged weapons.

skills.name: Weapons Expert
skills.description: Can use any missile weapon.

skills.name: Nimble
skills.description: No movement penalty for shooting.

skills.name: Trick Shooter
skills.description: Ignore penalties for cover and obstacles when shooting.

skills.name: Battle Tongue
skills.description: One warrior within 6" can re-roll one failed Leadership test per turn.

skills.name: Sorcery
skills.description: +1 to casting attempts (Wizards only).

skills.name: Streetwise
skills.description: -1 to Rare item availability rolls.

skills.name: Haggle
skills.description: Reduce the cost of rare items by 2D6 gold crowns (minimum 1gc).

skills.name: Arcane Lore
skills.description: May learn spells from a random magic list (must have Wizard rule).

skills.name: Wyrdstone Hunter
skills.description: +1 to wyrdstone discovery rolls.

skills.name: Mighty Blow
skills.description: +1 Strength in close combat.

skills.name: Pit Fighter
skills.description: +1 Attack, +1 Weapon Skill when fighting against two or more opponents.

skills.name: Resilient
skills.description: +1 Toughness.

skills.name: Fearsome
skills.description: Causes Fear.

skills.name: Strongman
skills.description: Can use two-handed weapons without the 'strikes last' penalty.

skills.name: Unstoppable Charge
skills.description: +1 Attack on the turn this model charges.

skills.name: Leap
skills.description: Can jump up to 6" across gaps. No Initiative test required.

skills.name: Sprint
skills.description: +1 Movement.

skills.name: Acrobat
skills.description: Falls do not cause damage.

skills.name: Lightning Reflexes
skills.description: Always strikes first in close combat.

skills.name: Jump Up
skills.description: Can stand up for free instead of using half movement.

skills.name: Dodge
skills.description: 5+ ward save against ranged attacks.
